title: ICE when items are defined inside fields

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

labels.name: E-mentor
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue has a mentor. Use RustcContributor::new on Zulip for discussion.

body:
Code:

```
struct S([u8; {struct Z; 0 }]);

fn main() {}
```

Reproduces on both stable and nightly.

Meta:

```
$ rustc --version --verbose
rustc 1.3.0 (9a92aaf19 2015-09-15)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 9a92aaf19a64603b02b4130fe52958cc12488900
commit-date: 2015-09-15
host: x86_64-pc-windows-gnu
release: 1.3.0

$ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 rustc test.rs
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'No def'n found for DefId { krate: 0, node: 11 }Z in tcx.item_variance_map', ../src/librustc\middle\ty.rs:5152
```
